name: The Changeling
description:
Content Warning: Suicide

“A Changeling: The mirror image of a human or in your case: The afterimage. Unlike the changeling of ancient mythology, you have no physical presence - can’t touch or be touched.

A soul without a body. 

But you may trade one human’s life for your own.”

A student project to boot, the Changeling brings you a story brought to life by glorious jank.

After being separated from their body, the Changeling has one chance to regain their humanity: Killing the groom at a highly publicized wedding. Trouble is, the Changeling doesn't have a physical presence in this world. So the Changeling's only weapons are words and they are powerful weapons, when used well.

But should they be used?
